title: Font ID: T-Mobile sans... not Omnes
content:
T-Mobile is using another sans beside Omnes for their marketing:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110304210906im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture1_6086.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110304210906im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture3_6017.png)

I really like that lowercase g too.

Mikey :-)
author: SuperUltraFabulous

comments.content: It looks a lot like [AG Book Rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20110304210906/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/ag-book-be-rounded/), maybe with a custom g? I agree the lc g is nice...
